alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:15AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
